Class GenericParser

  org.apache.commons.digester.parser.GenericParser
Deprecated. Create an XMLParser instance yourself, configure validation appropriately, and pass it as a parameter to the Digester constructor, or use Digester.setXMLSchema(javax.xml.validation.Schema) for validation.

extends Object
